title: Laundry
description: This is a service created to meet the personal hygiene and wearing needs of customers.

title: Shuttle
description: Shuttle service aims to meet the increasing travel demand and desire to create the most comfortable experience for customers.

title: Spa
description: Spa services meet the beauty needs of women, spa services include: sauna, acne peeling, hair washing...

title: Fitness Center
description: Multi-purpose gym is always a place of interest to visitors.  When traveling for work or travel, you still can ensure the progress of your workouts.

title: Swimming Pool
description: The 4-season swimming pool is always an interesting choice for guests when coming to the hotel with a four-season swimming pool.  Especially in hot weather, the swimming pool attracts the most visitors.
